headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Floor Space
content: When it comes to high-end vehicles you call yourself a collector, but admit it: you’re a hoarder. And that’s OK. We’re here to enable you. So Dynasty8 Executive is proud to present a range of 60-car garages. Yep, you read that right. These purpose-built temples to automotive greed can be added as a multi-floor extension to any one of our Executive Office suites, and can be outfitted to include your own personal mod shop. Just sign here.
